TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Cursor extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示沿 X 轴定义位置的横线或竖线。

span.span: Represents a horizontal or vertical line that defines a position along an axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 游标是定义沿某个轴的位置的水平或垂直的行。A cursor is a horizontal or vertical line that defines a position along an axis. 范围选择是沿某个轴定义的位置开始和结束位置，并显示使用半透明颜色范围。A range selection is a range along an axis that is defined by a beginning and end position, and is displayed using a semi-transparent color. 光标和范围选择实现由类，该类作为公开并的属性对象。Cursors and range selections are both implemented by the class, which is exposed as the and properties of the object. 对象表示的图表区的 X 轴和对象表示的 Y 轴。The object is for the X axis of a chart area, and the object is for the Y axis. 这些对象的属性确定关联的轴是否为主要或辅助。The property of these objects determines whether the associated axis is primary or secondary. 唯一的游标和范围选择的功能外找到类是与游标和范围选择相关的事件的根目录中对象。The only cursor and range selection functionality found outside the class are the events related to the cursor and range selection that are in the root object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个标志，该标志确定如果范围选择操作超出图表区域的边界，是否会发生滚动。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that determines whether scrolling will occur if a range selection operation extends beyond a boundary of the chart area.

value.span: 如果数据视图可以自动移动，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the data view can be scrolled automatically; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果数据视图不显示在绘制的序列中的所有数据点，范围已被用户选定的视图的自动滚动将发生如果此属性为`true`和鼠标，因此光标 — 也移动图表区域边界外。If a data view does not display all data points in a plotted series and a range is being selected by the user, automatic scrolling of the view will occur if this property is `true` and the mouse—and therefore the cursor—is moved outside the chart area boundary. 滚动时才会沿某个轴是否存在更多的数据可供查看。Scrolling will only occur along an axis if there is more data available to be viewed. 通常不会显示所有数据的数据视图会在最终用户缩放到的数据子集。A data view that does not display all data usually results if the end-user zooms into a subset of data. 通过实现视图和缩放类。Views and zooming are implemented by the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::AxisType AxisType { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::AxisType get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::AxisType value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置光标附加到的轴的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of axis that the cursor is attached to.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值表示光标是附加到主轴还是辅助轴。

span.span: An enumeration value that represents whether the axis is attached to the primary or secondary axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有两个组的轴： 主要和辅助。There are two sets of axes: primary and secondary. 主坐标轴的条形图之外的所有图表位于底部 （主 x 轴） 和左 （主 y 轴） 的图表区的边框。Primary axes for all charts except the bar charts are located at the bottom (primary X-axis) and left (primary Y-axis) border of the chart area. 辅助轴位于以下位置的右侧 （辅助 x 轴） 和图表区域顶部 （辅助 y 轴） 边框。The secondary axes are located at the right (secondary X-axis) and top (secondary Y-axis) border of the chart area. > [!NOTE] > 如果图表区域中绘制的所有序列都使用只有一种类型的轴 （例如，主 x 轴），然后将此属性设置为不使用 （在此情况下，辅助 x 轴） 的系列轴类型会不产生任何效果;光标将自动附加到唯一轴用于绘制序列。If all series plotted within a chart area use only one type of axis (for example, the primary X-axis), then setting this property to an axis type not used by the series (in this case, the secondary X-axis) will have no effect; the cursor will automatically be attached to the only axis being used to plot the series.

span.span: Releases the resources used by the class.

span.span: Releases unmanaged and, optionally, managed resources.

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置光标间隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the cursor interval.
The cursor interval.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定游标频率和位置可以绘制由最终用户，以及开始和范围选择的终结点可以绘制。The property determines how often and where a cursor can be drawn by an end user, as well as where the beginning and end points of a range selection can be drawn. 值为零，这是默认值，表示光标或范围选择可以在任意位置绘制图表区域中。A value of zero, which is the default value, signifies that a cursor or range selection can be drawn anywhere within a chart area. 一个非零值表示光标或开头和/或所选范围的终结点将仅绘制由用户交互时设置的指定时间间隔。A nonzero value signifies that the cursor or beginning and/or end points of a selected range will only be drawn at the specified interval when set by user interaction. 度量单位由属性。The unit of measurement is determined by the property. 此外可以结合使用此属性属性，它允许您指定的指定时间间隔中的偏移量。This property can also be used in conjunction with the property, which allows you to specify an offset from the specified interval. 例如，若要允许光标以仅显示每个星期六，1 周间隔应指定，以及 6 天的间隔偏移量。For example, to allow a cursor to only be displayed every Saturday, an interval of 1 week should be specified, along with an interval offset of 6 days. 在.NET Framework 中，被视为星期日为周的第一天。In .NET Framework, Sunday is considered to be the first day of the week. 如果通过设置启用了光标用户界面在图表区域内单击时属性和鼠标，光标的位置将设置为最近的允许的位置。If the cursor user interface is enabled by setting the property, and the mouse is clicked inside a chart area, the position of the cursor will be set to the nearest allowable location. > [!IMPORTANT] > 属性不起如果设置光标的位置或以编程方式将所选范围。The property has no effect if you set the position of a cursor or range selection programmatically.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double IntervalOffset { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.IntervalOffset : double with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置间隔偏移量，该偏移量影响当用户对光标和范围选择进行设置时可以绘制它们的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval offset, which affects where the cursor and range selection can be drawn when they are set by a user.
The offset from the interval.

value.span: 默认值为零，表示没有限制，允许使用负值。

span.span: The default value is zero, which signifies no limitations, and negative values are allowed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定游标和开始的间隔偏移量和/或范围选择的终结点。The property determines the interval offset of a cursor and the beginning and/or end points of a range selection. 结合属性，此属性确定在哪个位置游标和范围可以显示在图表区域中。In conjunction with the property, this property determines where a cursor and range can be displayed within a chart area. 值为零，这是默认值，表示是没有偏移量。A value of zero, which is the default, signifies that there is no offset. 度量单位由属性。The unit of measurement is determined by the property. 偏移量会影响游标和的开头和/或范围选择的终结点可以绘制时的位置。The offset affects the locations at which a cursor and the beginning and/or end points of a range selection can be drawn. 例如，若要允许光标以仅显示每个星期六，1 周间隔应指定，以及 6 天的间隔偏移量。For example, to allow a cursor to only be displayed every Saturday, an interval of 1 week should be specified, along with an interval offset of 6 days. 在.NET Framework 中，被视为星期日为周的第一天。In .NET Framework, Sunday is considered to be the first day of the week. 如果通过设置启用了光标用户界面在图表区域内单击时属性和鼠标，光标的位置将设置为最近的允许的位置。If the cursor user interface is enabled by setting the property, and the mouse is clicked inside a chart area, the position of the cursor will be set to the nearest allowable location. > [!IMPORTANT] > 时间间隔与相关的属性时不起作用范围选择或以编程方式设置光标位置。Interval-related properties have no effect when a range selection or cursor position are set programmatically.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType IntervalOffsetType { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置轴的光标和所选范围的间隔偏移量类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval offset type of a cursor and selected range for an axis.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值确定间隔偏移量的度量单位。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the unit of measurement for the interval offset.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定的间隔偏移量，使用指定的类型属性。The property determines the type of interval offset, which is specified using the property. 如果属性设置为，则将使用属性设置。If the property is set to , the property setting will be used. > [!NOTE] > 时间间隔与相关的属性时不起作用范围选择或以编程方式设置光标位置。Interval-related properties have no effect when a range selection or cursor position are set programmatically.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType IntervalType { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置轴的光标和所选范围的间隔类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval type for the cursor and selected range of an axis.

value.span: 轴的光标和所选范围的间隔类型。

span.span: The interval type for the cursor and selected range of an axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定的间隔，使用指定的类型属性。The property determines the type of interval, which is specified using the property. 如果间隔类型是，作为处理的时间间隔的度量单位`double`，这等同于一天时指定的值。If the interval type is , the unit of measurement for the interval is treated as a `double`, which is equivalent to one day when values are specified. > [!NOTE] > 时间间隔与相关的属性时不起作用范围选择或以编程方式设置光标位置。Interval-related properties have no effect when a range selection or cursor position is set programmatically. 如果轴间隔类型表示一次 — 例如，小时、 分钟和等，然后才能正确地启用了缩放功能，还必须设置为时间值。If the axis interval type represents a time—for example, hours, minutes, and so forth—then in order to correctly enable the zooming function, the must also be set to a time value. 例如，如果 ChartArea1.AxisX.IntervalType 以小时为单位，然后 ChartArea1.CursorX.IntervalType 将设置为分钟。For example, if the ChartArea1.AxisX.IntervalType is expressed in hours, then the ChartArea1.CursorX.IntervalType could be set to minutes.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置光标位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the position of a cursor.
The position of a cursor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于获取光标的位置，以及关于以编程方式设置游标位置。This property can be used to get the position of a cursor, as well as to programmatically set the cursor position. 位置度量由光标所属的轴的值作为属性。The position is measured as a value of the axis that the cursor belongs to, which is determined by the property. 例如，如果游标属于主 X 轴，然后将此属性设置为 2000 年 1 月 1 日的值将导致所绘制在 2000 年 1 月 1 日位置沿轴的 x 轴游标。For example, if the cursor belongs to the primary X axis, then setting this property to a value of January 1, 2000 will result in the X-axis cursor being drawn at the January 1, 2000 position along the axis. 如果此轴值不存在，将不显示光标。If this axis value does not exist, the cursor will not be displayed. 请注意，如果设置此属性，则和属性将不起作用; 即，光标将显示在此指定的位置。Note that if you set this property, the and properties will have no effect; that is, the cursor will be displayed at this specified location. 设置此属性将不会引发或事件。Setting this property will not raise the or events. 或者，和方法可以用于设置游标。Alternatively, the and methods can be used to set the cursor. 若要以编程方式删除游标，请使用此属性设置光标移到的位置。To programmatically remove a cursor, use this property to set the position of the cursor to .

get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置突出显示某一范围数据的半透明颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets a semi-transparent color that highlights a range of data.
The color of the highlighted range.

value.span: 默认值为 ，其 alpha 值为 120。

span.span: The default value is , with an alpha value of 120.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定的范围选择颜色，可以设置为任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 红色、 绿色、 蓝色） 值。This property determines the color of the range selection, and can be set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 如果 alpha 值，该值确定透明度级别，未提供，使用默认的 alpha 值为 120。If an alpha value, which determines the level of transparency, is not provided, a default alpha value of 120 is used. 所选的颜色可以设置为 X 和 Y 轴游标使用实现并的属性对象，分别。The selected color can be set for both the X and Y axis cursors, which is implemented using the and properties of the object, respectively. 如果沿 x 轴，仅选择一个范围，则如果沿 y 轴，仅选择一个范围，则值将使用在 x 轴游标;值将使用在 y 轴游标。If a range is only selected along the X-axis, the value for the X-axis cursor is used; if a range is only selected along the Y-axis, the value for the Y-axis cursor is used. 如果沿两个轴选择一系列的 y 轴游标还可用于所选颜色值。If a range is selected along both axes, the value for the Y-axis cursor is also used for the selected color.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double SelectionEnd { double get(); void set(double value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置范围选择的结束位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the end position of a range selection.
The end position of a range selection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户可以通过单击鼠标左键并拖动鼠标，然后选择图表区中的范围。A user can select a range within a chart area by clicking on the left mouse button and then dragging the mouse. 请注意，属性也必须设置为`true`。Note that the property must also be set to `true`. 此外，范围选择可以设置以编程方式使用并属性，或或方法。In addition, a range selection can be set programmatically using either the and properties, or the or methods. 范围选择的结束位置的计算方式的光标所属的轴值。The end position of a range selection is calculated as a value of the axis to which the cursor belongs. 例如，如果游标属于主 x 轴，并设置属性的值 2000 年 12 月 31 日，所选区域的最终会在 2000 年 12 月 31 日主沿 X 轴。For example, if the cursor belongs to the primary X-axis, and you set the property to a value of December 31, 2000, the end of the selected area will occur at December 31, 2000 along the primary X axis. 若要以编程方式删除范围选择，将开始和结束点的范围的使用并属性或使用方法。To programmatically remove a range selection, set the beginning and end points of the range to using the and properties, or use the method.

summary.span: 获取或设置光标所选范围的起始位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the start position of a cursor's selected range.

value.span: 光标所选范围的起始位置。

span.span: The start position of a cursor’s selected range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户可以通过单击鼠标左键，然后将光标位置移动通过拖动鼠标选择范围。A user can select a range by clicking on the left mouse button and then moving the cursor position by dragging the mouse. 请注意，属性也必须设置为`true`。Note that the property must also be set to `true`. 此外，范围选择可以设置以编程方式使用并属性，或或方法。In addition, a range selection can be set programmatically using either the and properties, or the or methods. 范围选择的起始位置的计算方式的光标所属的轴值。The start position of a range selection is calculated as a value of the axis to which the cursor belongs. 例如，如果游标属于主 x 轴，并设置属性 2000 年 1 月 1 日的值开头的所选区域会在 2000 年 1 月 1 日沿主 X 轴。For example, if the cursor belongs to the primary X-axis, and you set the property to a value of January 1, 2000, the beginning of the selected area will occur at January 1, 2000 along the primary X axis. 若要以编程方式删除范围选择，将开始和结束点的范围的使用并属性或使用方法。To programmatically remove a range selection, set the beginning and end points of the range to using the and properties, or use the method.
